Description:
----------------
Like your body, your brain needs exercise to stay fit. Just keep is to complete some exercises without pain,

stress or boredom. That's where Brain Challenge comes in! It's like a real vitamin boost for your brain. Brain Challenge is more than one

game or program. Alert Brain Challenge is your personal coach and entertaining, easy solution to keep your brain.

* Accessible to all people with a self-adjusting difficulty for real-time adaptation to the results!
* Coach and support staff dedicated
* The personal data into a personal training
* Daily and total letters of brain activity
* A total of 33 minigames divided into seven categories - logic, math, visual, concentration, stress management and creativity
Special Modes for Children and Adults
* 01.04 multiplayer (offline / online)
